name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The head of Okarin-in Temple of Kodaiji Temple in Kyoto, Japan: Last December, he found a Chinese photographer taking photos of other tourists in the forbidden area of the temple, and there was a notice of "No Commercial Photography" in the area. He went up to remind him, but the other party threatened in poor Japanese: "You will soon become part of China, so arrogant, be careful to be destroyed!" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjriYBbbMAAdiHj.png

The parent believes that Chinese education is a selective education that cannot inspire children's creativity. Children cannot have their own independent ideas and cannot question power and the existing system. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890074449447436288/pu/img/CwKFYOEsBcNCzFYZ.jpg

content:
Dalian, Liaoning. A lawyer said that on January 10, two plainclothes policemen from Henan and a local policeman came to the home of the client, Li Moumou, and forcibly took Li Moumou away without showing any documents.
After being rejected, the Henan police claimed that the client was a criminal suspect without any evidence and wanted to summon him, and the police summons was blank. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890080309145923584/pu/img/3amBWAkx7uFCp9bI.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 13, Jiangxi. A man said that he had donated 3,800 ml of blood before, and his brother and nephew donated more than 4,000 ml of blood in total.
Recently, his mother was seriously ill and needed blood for surgery, but the hospital told him that he had to donate blood in the near future to get blood supply. In order for his mother's surgery to go smoothly, the man and his family had no choice but to go to the blood station again to donate blood. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890084028881281024/pu/img/wv2qrKaxMJFYD3Xu.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 12, "Nucleic Acid King" Zhang Hezi posted a video of himself riding in the business class of a high-speed train on his Douyin account. This showed the outside world that he was not subject to restrictions on high consumption.
In the video, Zhang Hezi asked back: Is this high consumption? Then I want to report myself.
Netizens reported to the court in the comment area.
https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890103023768334339/pu/img/qjFduu6AmRaRww_2.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to http://611Study.ICU, among the 2,137 schools currently on the list, 45.5% of them have experienced student suicides.
Among them, 58.8% of schools in Henan had student suicides in 2024, 54.3% in Jiangsu, and 51.9% in Shanxi.
In terms of quantity, Shandong has 271 people and 97 schools; Henan has 269 people and 114 schools; Jiangsu has 216 people and 82 schools; Hebei has 205 people and 74 schools; Guangdong has 185 and 85 schools; Shanxi has 184 people and 55 schools

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 12, Tangshan, Hebei. At the Tangshan Nanhu Lantern Festival, three staff members helped a "trembling, trembling" Yushu robot onto the stage. Netizens mocked: "It has twisted the sky of the United States down"
"It's all Boston Dynamics' fault, the key code is not open source"
"This is the meaning of technology, one person solved the employment problems of three people" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890269145453019136/pu/img/-7z2j0hCbeZYcJq7.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hong Kong media Sing Tao Daily: Li Changyue, deputy mayor and director of the Public Security Bureau of Shaoyang City, Hunan Province, who was reported to have been shot last October, has had his personal information removed from the official websites of the Shaoyang Municipal Government and the Municipal Public Security Bureau, indicating that Li Changyue has been removed from his post.
The report pointed out that on October 1 last year, it was reported that a shooting occurred during the flag-raising ceremony of the Shaoyang Public Security Bureau. Li Changyue was shot and seriously injured and was sent to the hospital for emergency treatment. It was reported that the shooter was a special police officer who later died of a gunshot.
The on-duty staff of the Shaoyang Public Security Bureau said that they had not heard of this incident and urged "not to believe in rumors or spread them". So far, the authorities have not officially reported or responded to this incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 14 (Released) Zhaoqing, Guangdong. A car owner had an argument with a man, and then the car owner pulled out a pistol and pointed it at the man's head. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890321150091382784/pu/img/bALyL6eRXY3T7Jle.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hong Kong 01: The Japanese Language Proficiency Test organized by the Japan Foundation has been suspended due to a group cheating incident. In the test last December, the Japanese test center first took the N1 test and then the N2 test, while the Chinese test center did the opposite. So after the mainland Chinese candidates finished the N2 test, they uploaded the test questions to Xiaohongshu and provided them to the Chinese candidates who took the N2 test in Japan.
The organizer found that there were test papers with exactly the same right and wrong answers in the test center, and finally announced that the scores of many mainland Chinese and Taiwanese candidates were cancelled. Afterwards, some netizens posted on Baidu Tieba accusing the candidates of having their scores cancelled because of "reports by Chinese people", "Chinese people reporting Chinese people", and "new era traitors"

People around shouted in unison "Long live Chairman Mao" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890331913052909568/pu/img/YTdZFQw_Oqd2frN0.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
CCTV News: Li is focused on live-streaming exotic shows on short video platforms at home and abroad. Once when Li was live-streaming in a foreign country, he attracted the attention of the local spy intelligence agency. The spy intelligence agency believed that Li had a large number of fans in both countries and could be used as a target for rebellion, so they coerced Li to cooperate.
Netizens responded: "There is no time, place, or person, it's all about someone" "He is very enthusiastic in making up stories" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjvToZcacAATkJ7.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Zhang Xianyao, former vice chairman of Taiwan's Mainland Affairs Council, was indicted by prosecutors under the Anti-Infiltration Act, accusing him of helping mainland China intervene in Taiwan's presidential election and boosting the momentum of Guo Taiming, who is running for the independent election.
On February 12, the Qiaodong Prosecutor's Office believed that Zhang Xianyao was suspected of accepting instructions from mainland China to help Guo Taiming during the 2023 presidential election by holding forums and publishing polls. On Wednesday, the investigation concluded that Zhang Xianyao was indicted for crimes such as the Anti-Infiltration Act.
The pro-green "Mirror Weekly" reported on Tuesday that Zhang Xianyao had been "directly connected" to the office of Chinese President Xi Jinping by Li Wenzong, the chief accountant of former People's Party Chairman Ko Wen-je, and led the promotion of Ko Wen-je and Guo Taiming to run for president under the instructions of the mainland.
Zhang Xianyao issued a statement through his office to refute the report, emphasizing that he had not met with senior Chinese officials, did not hold any position in Ko's office, did not participate in fundraising, and did not publish fake polls before the election.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chongqing lawyer Zhang Zhiyong said that the reason for defending "corrupt officials" is that some people were made "corrupt officials" due to false evidence. Some people were convicted of embezzling millions of yuan even though they only embezzled hundreds of thousands of yuan. Some people were forcibly accused of embezzling tens of millions of yuan just because they held high positions. The pursuit of justice is important, but procedures and judicial justice are more fundamental and important. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjvbPAMacAAY9uQ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The number of marriages continues to decline, and it has been promoted to a "top leader project" in various places. In 2024, 6.106 million couples will register for marriage in China. This number is the lowest in nearly 40 years. The General Office of the State Council issued a document: Promoting the construction of a "fertility-friendly society" requires that all localities insist on the top leader personally taking charge and taking overall responsibility. On January 1, Luliang, Shanxi Province introduced measures to give money for marriage: a reward of 1,500 yuan will be given for the first marriage registration of both parties in the city. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjvfIcaacAQitBu.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Wind: In January 2025, Tianjin housing prices will fall back to the level of January 2014. Tianjin housing prices have experienced a "lost eleven years" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjvheGeaMAA7FjC.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the incident in which Tang Yuwen, a teacher at Baise Qifu Middle School, sexually assaulted female student Fu Yuehua for a long time, causing her to commit suicide due to depression, has attracted attention. On February 13, it was reported that his sister revealed to netizens that the local education bureau and police had been pressuring their family members to delete the video. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjvmLPwacAEiK2b.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 13, China's famous broadcasting artist Hong Yun passed away at the age of 81.
In addition to winning many awards at home and abroad, Hong Yun recited with deep emotion at the 20th anniversary celebration of Evergrande in 2016: "The first real estate project was planned, built and delivered in the same year." In 2021, Evergrande encountered a debt crisis and a large number of real estate projects were postponed. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjvpxOCasAAlNEv.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Financial Times: The number of marriage registrations in China fell to a 50-year low in 2024. The forecast chart of changes in China's age structure and the age structure of other parts of the world in 2025, 2050 and 2100 shows that China's population aging rate is much faster than that of other parts of the world. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjvufzdasAAmees.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 14, Yangjiang, Guangdong. It is reported that Longyuan Experimental School requires students to sign school rules, agreeing that the school can whip students' palms and punish them by standing in the corner.
The school rules also state that in order to prevent radiation and protect the health of teachers and students, the school does not allow mobile phones and other electronic products to enter the school; in order to prevent comparison, students are not allowed to wear clothes worth more than 100 yuan and shoes worth 80 yuan, https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gjvx89yacAEM3bR.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 13, the Supreme People's Procuratorate reported that Wei, a former deputy director of the Jiangxi Political and Legal Committee, took the initiative to join a gang in 2002 and became a key member, earning 60 million yuan. He was sentenced to 4 years and 4 months in 2022. 
This caused netizens to question: "He was sentenced to 4 years in prison for embezzling 60 million yuan. Is this still a deterrent? What will other people think?" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gjv4BkcacAArfma.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Russia criticized Chinese truck brands for defects and suspended sales of a model.
On February 10, the Russian Technical Regulation and Metrology Bureau announced that it would cancel the certification of a product of the Chinese automaker Shaanxi Automobile Heavy Duty Truck and suspend its sales in Russia. The agency said that in terms of noise control, rear collision avoidance and side protection, this product did not meet a series of mandatory requirements of Russia. Russia has imported 15,000 of this heavy truck. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gjv5sYpbkAAEr1n.jpg

Alibaba co-founder Jack Ma and other Chinese business leaders will attend the symposium, which may be held on the 17th. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gjv_GRhaIAAIyh4.png

content:
The patriotic theme movie "Operation Jiaolong" only grossed 378 million yuan in 17 days.
The film distributor said that "Operation Jiaolong" will be withdrawn from the schedule, and a special edition will be produced based on the suggestions of the audience. It will be released to the audience at a later date. Please stay tuned. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjwFz8HbIAAlap6.jpg

Xiaomi has not responded to the reason or solved the problem since then. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjwX7hba4AA9n2K.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 14, a lawyer posted a video saying that it is terrible for the government to use the crime of provoking trouble to suppress petitioners and wronged people. The crime of provoking trouble is often abused in practice, and no one cares why you hold banners or make trouble. Therefore, I advocate the abolition of the pocket crime of provoking trouble. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1890417885757206534/pu/img/izbZW_ceTh7b2o-R.jpg
